pathAssistantSteps.info:
On this stage you can record the following interactions:


“Solution Rejected”

To record that the 3P vendor provided solution did NOT solve the issue and moves the status back to "Pending Vendor”.


“Update”

To record any informative interaction with the 3P Vendor.

On this stage an “Open Case” interaction needs to be created.


This interaction is used to record when the 3P Vendor Case was raised towards the Vendor and once recorded the status will move to “Pending Vendor”.

On this stage you can record the following interactions:


“On Hold Period End”

To record when the On Hold Period ended and move the Status back to “Pending Nokia”.


“Update”

To record any informative interaction with the 3P Vendor.

On this stage you can record the following interactions:


“On Hold Period End”

To record when the On Hold Period ended and move the Status back to “Pending Vendor”.


“Update”

To record any informative interaction with the 3P Vendor.

On this stage you can record the following interactions:


“On Hold Period Start”

To record the need to have the case on hold (e.g. waiting for a customer attendance window). Status will move to “On Hold (PN)”.


“Response”

To record the response provided to a 3P vendor Information Request and move the status back to “Pending Vendor”.


“Update”

To record any informative interaction with the 3P Vendor.

On this stage you can record the following interactions:


﻿“Solution Received”

To record 3P Solution. Status moves to “Solution Received”


“Information Request”

To record an information request from the vendor. Status moves to “Pending Nokia”


“On Hold Period Start”

To record the need to have the case on hold. Status moves to “On Hold (PV)”


“On Site Arrival”

To record when vendor collaborator arrived on site premises


“Update”

To record any informative interaction with the 3P Vendor

On this stage you can record the following interactions:


“Solution Confirmed”

To record that the 3P vendor provided solution solved the issue and move the status to “Closed”.


“Solution Rejected”

To record that the 3P vendor provided solution did NOT solve the issue and moves the status back to “Pending Vendor”.


“Update”

To record any informative interaction with the 3P Vendor.
